name: sfpwowerscripts-createdeltapackage-task
description: This task is used to create an delta package between two commits and bundle the created delta as as a deployable artifact,This task is part of SFPowerscripts, Please ensure Install SFDX Task is used before utilizing this task
helpMarkDown: Read more about the tasks here at
author: azlam.abdulsalam
instanceNameFormat: Create Delta Package based on two commits

inputs.name: version_number
inputs.label: the version number of the package to be crated
inputs.helpMarkDown: The format is major.minor.patch.buildnumber . This will override the build number mentioned in the sfdx-project.json, Try considering the use of Increment Version Number task before this task

inputs.name: project_directory
inputs.label: Project Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: The project directory should contain a sfdx-project.json for this command to succeed

inputs.name: revision_from
inputs.label: Revision from where the diff Should be generated
inputs.helpMarkDown: The project directory should contain a sfdx-project.json for this command to succeed

inputs.name: revision_to
inputs.label: Revision from where the diff Should be generated
inputs.helpMarkDown: The project directory should contain a sfdx-project.json for this command to succeed

inputs.name: generate_destructivemanifest
inputs.label: Generate Destructive Manifest based on the diff
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check this option to generate a destructive manifest to be deployed

inputs.name: project_directory
inputs.label: Revision To
inputs.helpMarkDown: The project directory should contain a sfdx-project.json for this command to succeed

inputs.name: build_artifact_enabled
inputs.label: Create a build artifact with the package id  if the package creation is successful
inputs.helpMarkDown: Create a build artifact, so that this pipeline can be consumed by a release pipeline

inputs.name: isTelemetryEnabled
inputs.label: Send Anonymous Usage Telemetry
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enabling this will help us to collect information on the tasks and improve services. All information collected is anonymised, please check code repository to understand what data is collected
